meanings.definition: The state or quality of being an adult.
meanings.sent1: Her adultness was evident in the way she handled responsibilities.
meanings.sent2: As she turned 18, she embraced her adultness and started making her own decisions.
meanings.sent3: His friends teased him about his adultness when he chose to stay in and read a book on a Friday night.
meanings.sent4: The weight of adultness settled on her shoulders as she moved out of her parents' house.
meanings.sent5: The adultness of the situation hit him when he realized he had to pay bills and rent on his own.

meanings.definition: The characteristics or behaviors typical of an adult.
meanings.sent1: She admired the adultness of her boss, who always remained calm under pressure.
meanings.sent2: His adultness showed when he offered to help his elderly neighbor carry groceries.
meanings.sent3: The dog's adultness was evident when he refused to play with the puppy's toys.
meanings.sent4: The adultness of the team captain inspired the younger players to work harder.
meanings.sent5: Her adultness shone through as she made mature decisions during the group project.
